title: Lucy Bronze and Ellen White included on Ballon d'Or shortlist
text:
England’s Lucy Bronze and Ellen White have been named on the 20-strong shortlist for the Ballon d’Or, which will be presented in Paris on December 2.

Both players up for the award, which was given out for the first time last year, enjoyed a successful summer with England.

Manchester City’s White was the joint top goalscorer at the World Cup, scoring six goals in six appearances, while Lyon’s Bronze won the World Cup Silver Ball for the second best player of the tournament.

Following the World Cup, Bronze was also crowned Uefa women’s player of the year and was included in the team of the year at the Best Fifa Football awards. She made it onto the three-player shortlist for the best women’s player at those awards, but missed out to American Megan Rapinoe.

Responding to her Ballon d’Or nomination, Bronze wrote on Twitter: “A real honour to have been nominated for this year Ballon d’or. So many great players nominated, with so many great achievements this year! 2018-2019, what a season.”
description: England’s Lucy Bronze and Ellen White have been named on the 20-strong shortlist for the Ballon d’Or, which will be presented in Paris on December 2.
